headline: Jim Cramer on Steel Dynamics: “It’s an Excellent Company”
summary: Steel Dynamics, Inc. (NASDAQ:STLD) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared his take on. Answering a caller’s query about the stock during the lightning round, Cramer said: It’s an excellent company. I like Steel Dynamics, and I like Nucor. Those are the two. Wow, what a terrific buy. This is America doing well, and […]
